name: Credits Party
description:
Finishing a game is a celebration. And we should celebrate the people who made the experience possible too!

Credits Screen goals

  • Highlight the people that made the game
  • Make it easy to find the people/disciplines you're interested in
  • Show how many people it takes to make a game
  • Describe the different roles for anyone wondering how they can contribute to making games
  • Offer a chance for the player to appreciate the hard work that the team put in

Controls

  • Use the mouse to look around
  • Use WASD or arrow keys to walk around
  • Space bar or left click to thank a contributor

This is a submission for the Credits Jam (2020) game jam.

There are many more roles in game development that could be represented, but this prototype serves to be an example of what teams could do.
